bib_record.title: Further activation thermal neutron capture cross sections and resonance integrals

free_txt: Saturated absolute activities per atom after
irradiation bare, and after irradiation encased
in 1mm cadmium, were combined to determine the
2200 m/s cross section and reduced resonance
Beta efficiencies of the 4Pi-beta counter were
determined for each decay scheme. Corrections were
made for low specific activity, and electron
Overall error given in the tables includes the overall
systematic error, which is then added linearly to
the random error  calculated at the 99% confidence
level from the standard error of the mean to give the
flux level 1.26 x 10**7 n/cm*2/s. This value
is measured to 0.6% relative to the gold capture
121Sb,123Sb and 127I from the same set of exp.
All samples were thin discs of 22.mm diam.,
